detail_desc: Velour leggings with an elasticated waist.

Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with side stripes and wide ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Waist-high thong briefs in ribbed jersey with a V-shaped waist, narrow sides and lined gusset.

Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon crêpe with an opening at the front and narrow tie at the top. Long sleeves with smocked cuffs and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.

Parka in woven fabric with a sheen, a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim, zip down the front and drawstring and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud and concealed side pockets. Raglan sleeves with inner ribbing and a zipped sleeve pocket. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.

Ankle boots in imitation leather and imitation suede with a zip on the inside and adjustable tab with a metal buckle on the outside. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 11 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
A pair of earrings in the shape of pearly bead-covered metal hoops with a plastic lemon pendant. Length 4.5 cm.

Slightly shorter coat in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and concealed press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, side pockets and one inner pocket. Recycled polyester lining.
Leggings in soft jersey. Regular waist with wide, covered elastication. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Slightly boxy jumper knitted in a soft, fluffy wool blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut silk blouse with an opening and button at the front and decorative seam at the back. Long trumpet sleeves with an asymmetric cut at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Cycling shorts in ribbed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood, high stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets with press-studs. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Use these protective laundry bags when you wash your favourite things in the washing machine. They will last longer! 2-pack. Size 40x50 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit over the hips and thighs and skinny fit over the calves. Regular waist and button fly.
Jersey off-the-shoulder top in a patterned modal blend. Short, flounced sleeves with a drawstring at the top.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey with glitter.
Short top in an airy weave with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and a small frill trim a the top.
Suede boots with lacing at the front. Fabric linings, leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and wide cuffs with a covered button.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, open chest pocket and rounded hem.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cotton jersey top with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Sleeveless blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with crocheted lace sections at the top. Small, scallop-edged stand-up collar with an opening and buttons at the back of the neck, and a gathered yoke at the front.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting over the thighs for a fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved Henley tops in organic slub cotton jersey with a button placket.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a lined, padded hood and practical two-way zip down the front that can open from both directions for easy access. Extra-long sleeves with an inset section in stretch fabric underneath for greater movement and cuffs with thumbholes to help you stay warm outside. Front pockets with a concealed zip for safe storage of valuables. Rounded hem that is slightly longer at the back for a better fit when moving. Lined.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.
Make-up bag in transparent, patterned plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 8.5x10x18 cm.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hard smartphone case in marble-patterned plastic. Fits iPhone 6/6S/7/8.
Flared skirt in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist with a decorative bow. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in soft viscose jersey with wide smocking at the waist for a comfortable fit over the tummy. Unlined.

All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. The zip has a chin guard. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of all-in-one suit is organic.

Ankle-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a brushed thermal inside. Regular waist with a concealed drawstring, an open pocket on one leg, and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.
V-neck jersey nursing top with a wrapover front, concealed press-stud at the top and long sleeves. Practical inner top for ease of nursing access.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, round neckline, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist and wide, straight legs.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of joggers in soft fabric. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.
Bracelets in various designs, two with elastic and three in an adjustable length.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton and silk blend.
Bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.

Short dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, notch lapels, defined shoulders and long sleeves. Draped detail to define the waist, shaping seams at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Set with a bodysuit and pair of leggings in printed organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on the shoulder and at the crotch.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in soft, rib-knit wool with a turned-up hem.
Longer cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, buttons down the front and front pockets. Ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a slight sheen, sewn-in pleats, and side stripes in a contrasting colour. Fake welt pockets at the back and slits with a concealed zip at the hems.
Hairband in patterned jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front.

Lightly padded parka in soft cotton twill with a pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, patch pockets with a flap and press-studs, a drawstring at the waist and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined in pile.
Fitted top in stretch mesh with a round neck and long sleeves.
Ballet pumps in braided imitation leather with a hole pattern, pointed toes and open heels with long ties. Imitation leather linings and rubber soles.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Boxy cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Shorts in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Playsuit in soft organic cotton jersey with a round, elasticated neck and short, elasticated raglan sleeves. Elasticated seam and a decorative bow at the waist, and short legs.

Short dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Nursing top in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with functional fastening for easier nursing access, padded inserts and an elasticated hem.
